desc: At I Cycle Electric we are the electric bike specialists. We have been selling and riding electric bikes since 2010, giving us unrivaled knowledge of all types of e-bikes. It's this knowledge and experience that lets us deliver our outstanding levels of service that have seen people travel over 300 miles to buy from us

layout.text: WE ARE THE ELECTRIC BIKE SPECIALISTS
WE ARE THE ELECTRIC BIKE SPECIALISTS

We are an independent family run company specialising in retailing electric bikes in the north of England. We were established in 2010 and have been retailing electric bikes since then. We are not tied to any brand and align ourselves with products that provide good value for money and especially their reliability. Every electric bike that we sell comes with a minimum of 12 months warranty.
